download_data module¶

download_data.download_data(self)¶

Creates a ‘downloads’ folder, if it doesn’t exist. Downloads agricultural data from Github repository and saves it to this folder, in case it is not already downloaded. It also creates Pandas Dataframe from the downloaded csv file.
